title: The Balls of the Elves
description: The demon king having cursed the human race by removing their ability to produce female children so that they would go extinct has had his plan foiled by the elves who made men breedable by giving them eggs(balls) <span class="emoji-outer emoji-sizer"><span class="emoji-inner" style="background: url(chrome-extension://gaoflciahikhligngeccdecgfjngejlh/emoji-data/sheet_apple_32.png);background-position:95.94594594594594% 18.037602820211514%;background-size:5418.75% 5418.75%" data-codepoints="2642-fe0f"></span></span> which would make them become women when said ball is taken away from them.

matches.title: Ouji to Majou to Himegimi to
